Look up, turn your head, zigzag: Dérive is micro-adventure around the corner! The certainty of arriving at your destination, but without any suggested or imposed route.
 
The arrow gives you the direction, but you are the one choosing your path according to your intention (avoiding crowded roads, discovering a new street, daring to get lost...) rather than always opting for the most optimised route. Intuition, surprise, confidence: rediscover what the algorithms try to make you forget.
 
Dérives can be shared!
A meeting point, a cool exhibition, a restaurant to try? Send a dérive to your friends and guide them to your favourites. Leave them a note to discover when they arrive at the place you chose!
 
 
Surprise mode!
Wanna play? Share a surprise dérive with your friends by hiding the exact address from them. Let them strive to discover the spot where you are taking them. On arrival, the address and your secret message will be revealed. Ideal for a first date, a birthday party or a little thrill in your daily life!
 
So download the app, discover your city and share your adventures! 

Need more reasons to use Dérive? 
Dérive is committed to intimate, human, local and responsible travel:
 
- Intimate: Dérive does not collect your personal data, because it does not need it to work, and because your private life is none of our business. Even if many other applications would say the opposite ;)
 
- Human: Moving around all the time optimizing your way is for robots, not for humans. No need to look for speed and efficiency when you just want to enjoy the ride. Dérive just helps you rediscover the pleasure of strolling.
 
- Local: London is not New York, Paris is not Los Angeles and Rome is not Atlanta. Our cities are not gridded and designed for cars. They are full of hidden spots and are a paradise for pedestrians. So why use the same navigation app to get around?
 
 
- Responsible: Dérive is a lightweight application. It doesn't need to constantly optimize your journey time and display a map full of information to work. As a result, there is less CO2 emitted and less impact on your battery!
 
Dérive requires a working compass on your smartphone.
 
Dérive is a project created by Hérétique.

Great Friend Locator.

Once registered, each friend appears as a unique icon on the GPS Tracking Pro’s navigational map so you’ll know exactly where each friend is, at all times. Friend Locator
With GPS Phone Tracking, you can monitor your friend’s travel from one location to another via the app’s GPS maps. Reliable Cell Phone Tracker
GPS Phone Tracking can pinpoint the location of registered mobile devices, smart phones and even old school feature phones via the app’s website, 24/7. Phone Tracking for Friends With Feature Phones
Friends who don’t have the latest smart phone (or a smart phone at all), can still enjoy GPS Phone Tracking’s features and benefits – with a little help from their friends! If their phone is lost, the app will provide GPS navigation assistance to help you guide them its destination. It’s a phone tracker extraordinaire.

Innovative and Versatile Phone Locator

You have just spotted a ship off the coast and now you want to see which ship it is exactly and where it is going – do this easily with this marine traffic app. This ship radar app allows locating and tracking vessels – whether domestic or international, small or big – all this is live and free.

Using this ship tracker is very simple. Use the marine traffic map and select the ship you want to track. You will then be shown various details about this vessel and its current route.

Available vessel details:
-vessel name, IMO and photos
-vessel type and flag
-next port and ETA
-course and speed
-length and width

This vessel finder app also contains a port map. With this map you can find out the most important information about large and small harbors from all over the world with just one click.

In addition, you can call up 7-day wind, wave and weather forecasts, which will help you with your passage planning and weather management. Check the weather before and during trips, ocean races, regattas, cruises and all other types of offshore passages.

A compass is also integrated into this tracking app. This easy-to-use compass helps you to determine your own current position and thus helps you spotting ships with the ship radar map around your current location.

Are you wondering how it is possible that all this information appears live on your smartphone or tablet? Most modern ships have an AIS (Automatic Identification System) transceiver installed. This transceiver then sends the marine traffic information to a network of ship traffic stations around the world, so that you can see the exact current ship position and details about the ship.

# User-friendly Design #
Your current location will automatically appear as the point of intersection of two grey lines, and can also be manually indicated via value-input, location search, and import from clipboard functions as well. 

# Support of Various Coordinate Formats #
Not only the app specifies Longitude / Latitude, but also supports a number of coordinate formats and systems, i.e., Universal Transverse Mercator Coordinate System (UTM), Military Grid Reference System (MGRS), World Geographic Reference System (Georef), etc. 

# Datum Conversion #
The app is able to transform coordinates within EPSG , ESRI, IAU2000 references from online database, and convert X & Y coordinates, geodetic datums and projected systems.

Pin your desired location on the map to start navigation. Real-time bearing/distance update and large coordinate readout for on-the-field usage are available.

PezCA allows free access to information, even while offline, offering updated maps of sea surface temperature, chlorophyll concentration, currents speed and direction, altimetry, bathymetry, and the depth of the thermocline. In addition, tide forecast, moon phases, and
fishing information are available. A great tool for commercial and recreational fishermen, the tourism industry, and communities in general, with pezCA you can:

Access near real time maps of satellite data for the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans along Central America (0-19°N, 76.5-96°W) and get data values for your points of interest.

View the bathymetry and get bottom depth readings.

Overlay high-resolution satellite sea surface temperature and surface chlorophyll concentrations and get data for your points of interest, even while offline.

View maps with the latest speed and direction of the ocean currents, the depth of the thermocline, and sea level anomalies, and get values for your area.

Access information on tides and moon phases.

Review facts on the most common fish species in the region, including sizes, reproductive periods, and fishing information.

Review local laws and regulations.

Purchase your Costa Rica fishing license online!

Stay up to date on everything that’s happening with real-time notifications of weather events, red tides, fishing bans, tournaments, etc.

summary.label:
The NJ Rail app was created to provide you with real time departure information for NJ Transit Rail stations. Information the app provides includes: Destination, Departure Time (time the train is scheduled to depart the station), Train Number, Track Number, Train Line/Route Name, Status (countdown to train arrival/departure starting at 30 minutes)

If you want to find out whether a train is an express or a local?  Simply tap on the departure information and you'll see all upcoming station stops, including estimated arrival times. The arrival times are automatically adjusted to reflect any delays the train has experienced en route.

* A network (Internet) connection is required for this application to work.



FAQ
====================
Q: Is the NJ Rail app a substitute for NJ Transit Alerts?
A: No. We encourage all customers to sign up for alerts and advisories through NJ Transit.  While the NJ Rail app does a good job of telling you the train's status, it cannot explain incidents or provide travel advice.
   
Q: Sometimes there are slight differences between the NJ Rail app and the departure board in my station. Which is more accurate?
A: Although the NJ Rail app is updated several times a minute, during major service disruptions, the app may have difficulty getting accurate data from NJ Transit. In the event of a difference between the NJ Rail app and your station's departure board, you should consider the in-station information to be more accurate.


IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER
====================
Train status information is relayed to EasyTransit from NJ Transit. While every effort has been made to ensure that train status information is as reliable as possible, we cannot guarantee accuracy. EasyTransit is not responsible for the inconvenience, expense or damage resulting from errors, cancelled or delayed trains, or failure to make connections.  Customers are encouraged to listen to station announcements for additional information.
